bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of bai zhuo 白濁 , white turbidity, and yi jing 遺精 , seminal emission. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu ling 茯苓：濁遺帶下：威喜丸 , “For turbid emission and [discharge from] below the belt: [use] the ‘powerful happiness pills’”. Zi bai dian ban 紫白癜斑 , purple and white patches and macules [2]

Pathological Condition identical with zi bai dian feng 紫白癜風 , purple and white patches wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bei mu 貝母 quotes De sheng tang jing yan Recipe book. Yuan era. fang 德生堂經驗方 : 紫白癜斑：貝母、南星等分為末 , 生 薑帶汁擦之 , “For purple and white patches and macules : equal amounts of bei mu and nan xing are to be ground to powder. Mix with sheng jiang juice and rub on [the diseased region]”.
